changeSet.author: Kinser
changeSet.sql: update m_dictionary set items ='[{"order": 0,"value": "NONE","defaultItem": true,"description": {"languages": {"zh-CN": null}},"showContext": {"languages": {"zh-CN": "NONE"}}},{"order": 0,"value": "JS","defaultItem": false,"description": {"languages": {"zh-CN": null}},"showContext": {"languages": {"zh-CN": "javascript"}}},{"order": 0,"value": "TEMPLATE","defaultItem": false,"description": {"languages": {"zh-CN": null}},"showContext": {"languages": {"zh-CN": "template"}}}]' where code = 'ConverterType';
